Class Curve

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Track
        • Curve
  • public class Curve
extends Track
    Represents a track curve as a special type of track.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Leonard Bienbeck

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Track

        imageBaseName, layoutBlockId

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Curve​(CurveType curveType)
      Creates a track curve depending on the given type of curve but without specifying a layout block to which the curve belongs.
      Curve​(CurveType curveType, java.lang.String layoutBlockId)
      Creates a track curve depending on the given type of curve and specifying a layout block to which the curve belongs.

    • Method Detail

      • updateImage

        public void updateImage()
        Description copied from class: Track
        Abstract method by which the subclasses determine how the image representing the track is generated. This usually takes into account the state of the track, for example whether it is occupied or, in the case of turnouts, whether they are thrown or closed.
        Specified by:
        updateImage in class Track
